TestCaseMetaData.name: Smoke test App ACK
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Dr Radon's EHR-S transmits an application acknowledgement message to Century Hospital's LIS which indicates the ORU message Prothrombin Time (PT + INR) test results has been successfully parsed and incorporated.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: Test message for ACK_0.0_5.1-NG will be created.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Minimally populated message. Demonstrate capability to support creating a positive application acknowledgment Message in response to successful receipt of the ORU message: Minimally populated MSH Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSH segment. Minimally populated MSA Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support the minimally required data elements in the MSA segment.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the initial "smoke testing" to reveal simple failures of the application acknowledgment message severe enough to preclude further testing.
